item.title: GigE For Business Not So Far-Fetched
item.description:
The increasing demands of online technologies, particularly those using graphics and video, are putting pressure on Wide Area Network (WAN) bandwidth. While ordering a T1 line was once a big decision, businesses may soon need to consider Gigabit Ethernet connections. While Gigabit Ethernet is often associated with large-scale networks, it’s becoming increasingly relevant for businesses. With corporate LANs already transitioning to faster speeds, the WAN connection often becomes a bottleneck...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/gige-for-business-not-so-far-fetched/
